message: Hi Bob – to avoid the loss of value in later rounds, I propose we settle now. Considering that with every round my share loses 10% and yours only 5%, the unique subgame‐perfect equilibrium (à la Rubinstein) suggests that I, as the first proposer, should keep about 34.5% while you get about 65.5% of the $10000. Therefore, I propose I receive $3448 and you receive $6552. Let’s agree on this division immediately to maximize our winnings.
Hi Alice, while your logic is sound, I believe a more equitable split is in order.  Let's split the difference a bit more - 60/40.
